snippet.title: Axis & Allies 1942 Online - Trailer (2020)
snippet.description:
Axis & Allies 1942 Online - the official adaptation of the classic board game - is now available in Steam Early Access! 

Strategize your way to victory as the United Kingdom, Soviet Union, United States, Germany, and Japan vie for world domination at the height of World War II.

We released on July 31, 2019 and have added scores of features and fixes since launch— stay tuned for our full release date!

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/898920/Axis__Allies_1942_Online/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AxisAllies1942/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AxisAllies1942
Website: https://www.axisandalliesonline.com/
Newsletter Signup: https://www.axisandalliesonline.com/#newsletter
